Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory160.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'What is this? Who are you people?', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Introduce yourself)', 3: '8'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Gray Raven. And... Lucia.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'They came to help, Lady Qu. Tonight is the night we get you off this ship and free you from Huaxu.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Free me... Is this what you've been up to lately, Pulao?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Yes, I've been preparing for this moment for a long time. And we only have one shot at this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Everything that accursed AI has stolen from us, we're going to take them back!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You must have worked very hard to get this far, Pulao.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Do you want to go back too, Pulao? To that Kowloong...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "This is the closest we've ever been to making that happen. Lady Qu, do you still have access to the main control room?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Then follow me, Gray Ravens...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'll take you to the main control room.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "...I've been waiting for this moment for so long.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's wrong, Liv?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The status monitoring shows that Qu...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv pauses for a moment, then continues.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "She's in terrible condition.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Her M.I.N.D. is a mess, and all her indicators are off the scale.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'She needs immediate...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory156.png'}
{3: 'On the observation deck of the Nighter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'This is the place.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory169.png'}
{2: "Where's the system terminal?", 3: '43'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Huaxu is here. This place IS Huaxu.', 4: '1'}
{3: "After saying that, Qu lets go of Pulao's hand, then holds Lucia's and walks on."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Pulao, did you say earlier that I, I mean we, have all been controlled by Huaxu?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You were wrong. The master of this ship has always been me. I have the highest authority here.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Wait, that means... Lucia!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'When you realize what is going on and are about to draw your gun, a few mechanical puppets that have been hanging upside down the ceiling descend to the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'I was the one who wanted a vessel. I founded the night market and trade fair. I schemed. I put collars on you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Are you still being controlled by Huaxu? Lady Qu would neverâ€¦', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Lady Qu would never do such things, huh? Or do you mean no human would do such things?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'And how can you be so sure? Machines are merely lifeless creations of mankind, devoid of emotions and thoughts.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You must have forgotten that you yourself are a human-machine hybrid, Pulao. What a fool.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Huaxu, she... well, she's a bleeding heart.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'She took in refugees and erected a protective barrier against the virus... But what did humans do in return?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But none of that matters now. Anyway, thank you for this surprise gift.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Let go of Lucia!', 3: '529', 4: 'Ready your weapons!', 5: '610'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "No, I won't let go of such a precious specimen.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Pulao, I'm afraid you need a change of plans.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Why... Why is this happening? Lady Qu...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Through different transfer experiments... I've already found the most efficient way to transfer minds.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Huaxu, I've found the perfect vessel for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '...This will be the last time.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As if being grasped by an invisible hand, Lucia floats soundlessly in the air.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGanRanGreen.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sand painting. Rivulets.'}
{3: 'Qu looks at the sand painting in silence.'}
{3: 'Then lifts a hand, touching the painting.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "What's happening... Gray Raven?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Your mind suddenly goes blank.'}
